properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_NOTICE WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_ENROLL, NOTICE_VIEWS FROM TB_NOTICE WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
INSERT INTO TB_NOTICE ( NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , ADMIN_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_NOTICENO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? )
